items.sentence: Tom called the students back into the room to tell them about the plane crash.
Tom decided that it wouldn\'t be sensible to try to cross the old rope bridge.
Tom wants to know if you\'re planning on going to Boston with us next weekend.
Tom put the bowl into the microwave and pushed the button to start it cooking.
If I hadn\'t had your cooperation, I couldn\'t have finished the work in time.
